summary: "Man of Steel" is a 2013 superhero movie about Superman, made by Warner Bros. and directed by Zack Snyder. It's a new start for the Superman series, showing how Clark Kent, an alien from Krypton, discovers his superpowers and becomes Earth's protector. The film stars Henry Cavill as Superman, and it was the first in a new series of DC superhero movies. It made lots of money but got mixed reviews. People liked the action but thought the story was too much like other blockbuster movies.
title: Man of Steel (film)
